title: Lipgloss Spy
overview: Barali is a young girl dreaming of long journeys. She loves to make up and with the help of makeup can transform into anyone. Unexpectedly, she accepts the offer of a policeman friend and agrees to work undercover. She will have to go abroad, having in her arsenal only a bottomless cosmetic bag and a great desire to see the world. There they also took to meet a dream man with perfect skin, with whom she would have to cooperate side by side, and with whom she would, of course, fall in love.Lacorn based on the novel.
